english.segment1: Oh Great God, there's nothing you can't do. Oh Great God, You speak and mountains move. We believe, We believe
english.segment2: Oh Great God, there's none outside Your reach. Oh Great God, You give us faith to see. And believe, We believe
english.segment3: With You all things are possible. It's true that You are unstoppable. Your light will never fade. Your promises remain unchanged. You will reign
english.segment4: Oh Great God, We're rising up to say. We Believe, We Believe
english.segment5: There is none so able. To mend broken hearts. Heal every sickness. There is none so able. To waken the dead. Light up the darkness
